list.abs: He had a dowdy wife and several children ., 他有一个相貌平平的妻子和几个孩子.

she made several attempts to find other employment , but her dowdy appearance made her look old and inefficient .她找了几次工作，但是她邋遢的外表使她看起来又老又没用。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late 16th cent. (as a noun): from dowd

entry.tran: (人或衣着)单调的，土气的，不时髦的
entry.def: If you describe someone or their clothes as dowdy, you mean their clothes are dull and unfashionable.

example.ex: ...playing hostess to a lot of officials and their dowdy wives...
example.tran: 接待众多官员及他们衣着落伍的夫人

example.ex: Her clothes were clean but dowdy.
example.tran: 她衣着整洁但有点土气。
